title: About Us
text: Aliph Manufacturing, founded in 2006, is a high-tech enterprise specializing in the research, development, production, and sales of polymer materials. With two major production bases in Yangzhou and Suzhou covering over 25,000 square meters, we provide a comprehensive range of safety protection solutions, including insulation, sealing, waterproofing, thermal conductivity, fireproofing, and electrical conductivity, widely applied across industries such as electricity, telecommunications, automotive, and electronics etc.
